name: Qt/C++ Linux Developer
description:
Parallels Remote Application Server is a virtual application and desktop delivery solution allowing to access and use applications and data from any device. From engineering perspective it's a technically challenging and interesting project, involving many programming languages, distributed across several operating systems and platforms, working on-prem or in the cloud.

If you’re ambitious and thrive on working with the world’s big company to solve tough problems together with a smart, motivated team, you would want to work here.

Responsibilities

  • Design and develop features for RAS Linux Client (desktop and thin clients)
  • Work closely with UI/UX designers and Product managers on new features design and implementation
  • Improving existing legacy code base

Requirements

  • 2+ years of programming in C++ and Qt, good understanding of Qt internals
  • Experience with development for Linux platforms
  • Understanding of OOP, design patterns
  • Understanding principles of multithreaded programming
  • Good written English; spoken English is a plus

Knowledge and actual experience in any of the following is a plus

  • Experience in client-server application development
  • Experience with user-space devices (USB, smart cards, web cameras) programming on Linux
  • Experience in writing component automated tests
  • Understanding principals of Clean code development
  • Being experienced with Unit Testing and TDD

​​​​​​​Benefits

  • Competitive salary
  • Learn new technologies and platforms, participating on conferences
  • Flexible work schedule
  • Occasional business trips to Maltese office
  • Friendly team of experienced multinational professionals
  • Medical and dental insurance
  • Gym discount
  • Remote work
